txt.en: 'I wish they would be silent,' the woman says quietly, her voice little more than a whisper. You look around, wondering if she is perhaps referring to the children of Tadrent. She shakes her head, but does not raise her voice.\n\n'It is the insects: the sickle-flies and the angry gnats. Their buzzing is so loud. How can anyone think with that constant racket going on? I have asked the guard to do something, but they have barely lifted a finger to help. Perhaps you can do something about them?'
Defeat sickle-flies and angry gnats for Mousy Othwen ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Mousy Othwen is in southern Tadrent, in King's Gondor.

'You have done so well!' she says, happily but quietly. 'I barely hear any buzzing at all!'

The woman closes her eyes and for a moment it seems she will drift off to sleep. Then she opens one eye and fixes it upon your face.

'It is very quiet now. How will I ever be able to think with this dreadful silence echoing in my head?'

You politely take your leave of Mousy Othwen before she can ask you to release more sickle-flies or angry gnats outside Tadrent.
Mousy Othwen is trying to relax, but the sound of insects is driving her mad.

'The buzzing of the sickle-flies and angry gnats near Tadrent is so loud. How can anyone think with that constant racket going on? I have asked the guard to do something, but they have barely lifted a finger to help. Perhaps you can do something about them?'
Talk to Mousy Othwen in southern Tadrent, in King's Gondor
Sickle-flies and angry gnats are a constant irritation for Mousy Othwen, a somewhat eccentric resident of Tadrent, in King's Gondor.
